attributes.action: legalize the use of medicinal marijuana for Crohn's patients
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Crohn's is a debilitating disease that ravages any part of the digestive system.
This can cause multiple problems and the sufferers are usually in a lot of pain, not least mentioning the side effects of the numerous pills to take.
Cannabis has been proven to ease the pain caused by this horrible non-contagious disease, and instead of spending millions of pounds on new drugs, why not allow patients to use medicinal marijuana, which is proven to help symptoms,. in conjunction with the conventional pills and other forms of treatments?
